title: Just QUIT working today
content:
Today Thunderbird just quit working. It will show new messages in my accounts but will not display the message contents. Just a blank message pane. Also quit working with my Startmail account entirely. Also shows as busy in various accounts. What is really strange is that it was working perfectly at 1 this morning now just out of the blue I am dead in the water.

Any ideas ??
creator: Scorpn1
